trans-unit.source: The base class for a transaction.
trans-unit.target: Classe di base per una transazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza un nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" />.

trans-unit.source: Commits the database transaction.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il commit della transazione di database.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> object associated with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Specifica l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> associato alla transazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> object associated with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> associato alla transazione.

trans-unit.source: A single application may have multiple data source connections, each with zero or more transactions.
trans-unit.target: Una singola applicazione può avere più connessioni a origini dati, ognuna con zero o più transazioni.

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà consente di determinare l'oggetto connessione associato a una particolare transazione.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> object associated with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Specifica l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> associato alla transazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> object associated with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> associato alla transazione.

trans-unit.source: A single application may have multiple data source connections, each with zero or more transactions.
trans-unit.target: Una singola applicazione può avere più connessioni a origini dati, ognuna con zero o più transazioni.

trans-unit.source: This property allows you to determine the connection object associated with a particular transaction.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà consente di determinare l'oggetto connessione associato a una particolare transazione.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate da <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> e, facoltativamente, le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> should rollback the transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> deve essere il rollback della transazione.

trans-unit.source: However, the behavior of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> is provider specific, and should not replace calling <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Rollback%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il comportamento di <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> provider specifica e non devono sostituire la chiamata <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Rollback%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" />.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> should rollback the transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> deve essere il rollback della transazione.

trans-unit.source: However, the behavior of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> is provider specific, and should not replace calling <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Rollback%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il comportamento di <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> provider specifica e non devono sostituire la chiamata <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Rollback%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> references.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse contenute da qualsiasi oggetto gestito a cui questa classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> fa riferimento.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate da <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction" /> e, facoltativamente, le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> should rollback the transaction.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> deve essere il rollback della transazione.

trans-unit.source: However, the behavior of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> is provider specific, and should not replace calling <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Rollback%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il comportamento di <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Dispose%2A> provider specifica e non devono sostituire la chiamata <xref:System.Data.Common.DbTransaction.Rollback%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> for this transaction.
trans-unit.target: Specifica l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> per questa transazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> for this transaction.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.IsolationLevel" /> per questa transazione.

trans-unit.source: Rolls back a transaction from a pending state.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il rollback di una transazione da uno stato in sospeso.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> object associated with the transaction, or a null reference if the transaction is no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> associato alla transazione o un riferimento Null se la transazione non è più valida.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> object associated with the transaction.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbConnection" /> associato alla transazione.
